title: Happy Hour: Bright Lights, Big City
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: Undercover officers busted up a Brentwood drug operation and seized $89,000 in black tar heroin earlier this week. [WSMV] Nashville has officially received more snow than average. Obviously. [Nashville WX] So it’s probably a good thing you can purchase the last (used) loaf of bread in Nashville on eBay for a cool $49.99. If you live in Hendersonville, you can even have it hand-delivered. [eBay] The Twitters have been buzzing with Jake Gyllenhaal sightings! Though we realize this does not […]
contentEncoded:
• Undercover officers busted up a Brentwood drug operation and seized $89,000 in black tar heroin earlier this week. [WSMV]
  • Nashville has officially received more snow than average. Obviously. [Nashville WX]
  • So it’s probably a good thing you can purchase the last (used) loaf of bread in Nashville on eBay for a cool $49.99. If you live in Hendersonville, you can even have it hand-delivered. [eBay]
  • The Twitters have been buzzing with Jake Gyllenhaal sightings! Though we realize this does not really count as news, we want to let you know that you’re free to report these sightings directly to us. [CNN]
  • The Tennessee State Fairgrounds story made the New York Times yesterday! [NYTimes]

Photo by Bryan Quigley.
